name: Death Loop (RagnaChris)
description:
Concept

Death Loop is a 2D Platformer where the level is designed to be tricky to pass through. You can use your abilities to get in the void and stop moving platforms. How many death do you need to escape from this loop?

Diversifier

Lamdadelta: Every level has two different perspective.

Tenet: Implementasi time manipulation mechanic.

The Water Is on Fire Combine two different terrain for a level.

Controls

Arrow Keys: Move
Space Bar: Use ability
R Key: Restart/Respawn at last checkpoint

Assets

Art created by myself
